oracion1: The final thing I want to teach you all is about our country, Costa Rica!
Costa Rica is a beautiful and unique country. We have many different types of environments here.

oracion2: Yes! You can go to the mountains in Monteverde. You can also go hiking in the forest there and see many animals.

oracion1: Can I go to a beach in Costa Rica?
You can go to Manuel Antonio – a beautiful beach on the Pacific Ocean. You can swim in the water and enjoy the warm sun.
We want to see something in the city!
oracion2: That’s wonderful! There are many concerts, plays, shopping centers, and museums in the city.

oracion1: You learned so much about what humans do and where we live. Now you are ready to live with your new families. Good luck everyone!
